list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a regular stopping place on a public transportation route, especially one on a railroad line with a platform and often one or more buildings.
a place or building where a specified activity or service is based.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a research station in the rainforest
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một trạm nghiên cứu trong rừng nhiệt đới

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a company involved in broadcasting of a specified kind.
the place where someone or something stands or is placed on military or other duty.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the lookout resumed his station in the bow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lookout đã tiếp tục trạm của mình trong cung

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a site at which a particular species, especially an interesting or rare one, grows or is found.
short for Stations of the Cross.
put in or assign to a specified place for a particular purpose, especially a military one.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: troops were stationed in the town
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: quân đội đã đóng quân trong thị trấn
